criticalActions.impact: Low word count hurts SEO rankings and user engagement
criticalActions.action: Expand these posts to 1500+ words with more detailed content

criticalActions.impact: Missing internal links reduces time on site and SEO authority flow
criticalActions.action: Add 3-5 relevant internal links to each post

criticalActions.impact: External links to authority sites improve content credibility and SEO
criticalActions.action: Add 2-3 external links to authoritative sources (e.g., Google, industry studies)

quickWins.action: Add hero image, infographics, or screenshots to improve engagement

contentOpportunities.action: Create 2-3 more posts in: marketing, Google Ads, SEO
contentOpportunities.reasoning: These categories show highest engagement and traffic potential

contentOpportunities.action: Update 4 oldest posts with 2025 data, new stats, and current best practices
contentOpportunities.reasoning: Fresh content ranks better and shows expertise

growthStrategies.recommendation: Maintain current publishing pace, focus on quality and promotion
growthStrategies.expectedImpact: Consistent publishing improves domain authority and organic traffic growth
